tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Ares
programme.desc: Someone kills a Naval officer on Okinawa, then his ship encounters major trouble during war games at sea.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Skeleton Crew
programme.desc: The body of a woman Naval officer, a friend, and classmate of Harm, is found ashore.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Trinity
programme.desc: Harm and his new partner, Marine Major Sara MacKenzie are drawn into a game of revenge when they're sent to Belfast, Ireland, to represent the legal interests of a Navy Lieutenant whose infant son has seemingly been abducted.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Bat Poop Crazy
programme.desc: Before Halloween, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a deep, vast cave system in order to prevent a bat population from destroying the North America ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.sub-title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.desc: On Election Day, as democracy hangs in the balance, Team Scorpion is called on when someone tries to throw the U.S. presidential election into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sly And The Family Stone
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion travels to Ireland for Megan's one-year memorial, Walter discovers that a nearby lake's natural disaster has created a poisonous cloud that could kill everyone in the village.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Mother Load
programme.desc: Paige's estranged mother calls on Team Scorpion when she accidentally uncovers a forgotten nuclear reactor on the verge of exploding.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Wreck The Halls
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion's electronics-free mountain getaway turns deadly when they come across gun-runners, and Ralph is kidnapped when they try to escape.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and the Most Haunted team are invited to the inner sanctum of the Freemasons to investigate the many ghost sightings at Clifton Hall. Even before the investigation starts the team are faced with some of strange phenomena witnessed by others.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Part two of their investigation into Clifton Hall sees the team splitting with going it alone. For one of the team the night becomes terrifying as they find themselves locked in a room with an unseen force.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team take on their largest investigation to date. They have been invited to investigate a large estate where it seems just about every building has a ghostly tale.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Camp Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Jason and TAPS go to camp! They head to Camp Rutledge in Georgia where a woman has experienced paranormal activity since she was a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pirates
programme.desc: Fear is spreading at Fort Taber-Fort Rodmanthat a new \\"living history event\\" has stirred up frightening paranormal activity on the park grounds.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 200th Episode: Grant is Back
programme.desc: On this 2 hour special, TAPS celebrates their 200th episode by re-visiting one of their favorite and most haunted locations, Trans-Allegheny Lunatic Asylum and by calling on old friends, Grant, Dustin and Joe.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.136
programme.desc: Man racks up $3,600 on ex's credit card, claims shared benefit; childhood friends dispute dating, feud over big-screen TV ownership.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.21
programme.desc: Partygoer punched, falls into window, needs 30 stitches; assaulter alleges invasion of personal space/Surprise party host sues friends for fighting, property damage/Woman accused of keying car denies jealousy retaliation involving boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.103
programme.desc: Threats to kill kittens, questionable remarks about a man’s sexuality and inappropriate, drunken toasts after the death of a child come into play when ex-friends fight over alleged vandalism.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.142
programme.desc: Man sues mother of his child for selling his Baby Pac-Man game; she counters for harassment, alleging cheating. Man claims ex's obsession forced him to move; she sues for unpaid rent, electric bill.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.28
programme.desc: Denying they sold their friends a lemon, a man and his fiancée sue for slander and harassment/A black Labrador bites an 8-year-old in the face; the child’s mother sues a friend for the cost of plastic surgery to repair the wound.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.187
programme.desc: A man sacrifices his job and house to move for his girlfriend but faces a broken lease and ring dispute after their breakup. Another man is sued by his child's grandmother for allegedly vandalizing her Chrysler Sebring.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.131
programme.desc: Man sued by parents after second wife's mysterious death and $40,000 life insurance policy; alleged child abuse involved/Man calls cops to remove ex-girlfriend from apartment, sues her for rent after she leaves, fearing for his life.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.31
programme.desc: The emotional burial of a pet Chihuahua leads to a violent, bloody\t\t\t\r\nassault between family members/A woman sues her ex-fiancé for a loan to buy a home. He claims she wrecked his truck while driving drunk, so he’s not paying.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.97
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-roommate-to-be of stealing her security deposit; she is countersued for rent and money owed/A 21st birthday celebration ends with a young woman allegedly wrapping a borrowed car around a pole.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.110
programme.desc: Custody of a beautiful, homemade baptismal gown is disputed by entranged family members/While driving with her five children in the car, a woman runs a red light, is arrested and is later sued by her uncle who claims he bailed her out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.239
programme.desc: A landlord fights with tenants over a new motorcycle ignition, a damaged helmet, and an insurance bill; he countersues for unpaid rent and utilities.\t\t\t\r\nA young woman goes after her former roommate and his girlfriend for rent and a security deposit.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The 19 remaining chefs immediately become 18 after a dramatic walkout from one of the hopefuls. Despite Gordon attempting to teach the group about teamwork with an army-led physical challenge, a disastrous food service leads to another elimination.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Olympic athletes Maurice Greene, Natalie Coughlin and Danell Leyva help Ramsay lead a 3K race, with the red and blue teams racing to prepare lunch for the runners; communication issues lead to fights during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must identify the type of protein used in five dishes; as the winning team enjoys its victory at a beach house, the losing team must grind and mill grains to make bread from scratch; contestants are grilled during elimination.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay makes a decision that changes the competition; two chefs work as servers during the dinner service; each team nominates two contestants to be put up for elimination.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Martin Yan judges six Chinese dishes created by the remaining contestants; during dinner service, one team disappoints a VIP guest; a contestant is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants enter an animal pen to determine which type of protein they will cook in the team challenge; during dinner service, the contestants must impress chef Ramsay's family.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Shy Dial
programme.desc: Jeff uses an app on his phone that automatically puts his calls through to Audrey's voicemail. Meanwhile, Adam befriends a clothing salesman who helps him against his friends when he picks up some questionable clothing choices.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Chair
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey engage in a battle of wills when she refuses to admit that she hates the armchair she ordered while Jeff pretends to love it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy's help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: After The Lovin'
programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dog Is Smokin'
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his tooth that allows him to communicate with his van.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.(n)

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse of Ice
programme.desc: Already in the throes of a viral pandemic, a massive polar vortex threatens to cover nearly all of Earth in ice.(n)

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.(n)

programme.title: Capricorn One
programme.desc: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret. Starring: Elliott Gould, James Brolin, Brenda Vaccaro, O.J. Simpson, Sam Waterston.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Warriors
programme.desc: An evil wizard, Lord Tensley, seeks the hand and heart of the beautiful princess. When she refuses, he locks her away and releases a deadly dragon to terrorize the land. Starring: James Marsters, Kaitlin Doubleday, Luke Perry.(n)

programme.title: 2012: Ice Age
programme.desc: When a volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier hurtling toward North America, a family struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: A runaway bride does some soul-searching when she’s trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Lodge
programme.desc: During a weekend trip to the mountains, Mary finds herself at the now run-down lodge where she spent the holidays with her family growing up. She becomes determined to restore the building to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When Ashley’s plans to reconnect with her high school sweetheart over Christmas fails, she and her best friend Liam decide to fake their own romance. But as her feelings start to turn real, Ashley will have to decide what her heart really wants.(n)

programme.title: Her Son’s Secret
programme.desc: Sarah has never given up. Having lost her son Matt 13 years ago – presumed drowned and the body never recovered -- she still keeps her hopes up. One day, Matt shows up at Sarah’s door.(n)

programme.title: My Son Is Innocent
programme.desc: After a brutal nighttime rape, police investigators zero in on teenager Eric Sutter. When the victim identifies Eric as her attacker, the legal system closes in on the boy as friends, neighbors and the media turn against him.(n)

programme.title: Presumed Dead
programme.desc: An international crime novelist is the primary suspect in the disappearance of a young woman and it's up to Detective Mary Anne Cooper to piece together this bizarre missing person's case.(n)

programme.title: Madea's Witness Protection
programme.desc: Placed under federal protection in Madea's (Tyler Perry) Southern home, a Wall Street banker (Eugene Levy) and his dysfunctional family get a taste of the no-nonsense matriarch's special brand of tough love.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: A madman forces young friends to kill one another to try to survive a sadistic game.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas and Mark are traveling across the Mexican desert they encounter a trio of Mexican bandits who demand payment to cross "their" desert.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Milly are held hostage in her general store when two gunmen attempt a daring robbery.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas turns them down because they are escorting a murderer, to be hanged in Yuma.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark goes to work for Will Temple, a badly scarred, very mysterious rancher.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Corey Hazlett insists he's innocent of murder, despite Lucas's eyewitness testimony.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Old Slanders
programme.desc: Earp saves Old Man Clanton during a robbery attempt. In Tucson, the Ten Percent Ring forces Dameron to print false stories about Earp in the Nugget.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Loyalty
programme.desc: Doc Holliday hits a long winning streak at the card tables and winds up with stock in a mine and railroad, both of which soon have a tremendous jump in value.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Johnny Behan Falls in Love
programme.desc: Wyatt finds himself in the awkward position of having to help crooked Sheriff Behan.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Casey and the Clowns
programme.desc: Earp prepares for trouble when a group known as the Harlequins is expected to return to town. Although they disguise themselves as clowns, they have sinister intentions.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Must Wait
programme.desc: An American inherits an old village church in England, where treasure is buried. Greedy Mr. Slee scents his opportunity to snatch the treasure. Diggity, a little cherub trying to earn his wings, helps uncover the treasure for the benefit of the village.(n)

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: In 1920s Vienna, lonely Mary receives a nutcracker doll from her Uncle Albert. On Christmas Eve, her imagination brings it to life as "NC," leading her on a perilous journey against the Rat King's plot to overthrow humanity.(n)

programme.title: Mark & Russell's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Mark is excited when the most popular girl in his class asks HIM to drive her to a party, except he doesn't have a license. With his popularity on the line and his best friend Russell in tow, Mark hits the road on a cross-town adventure.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.(n)

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News. Starring: Kristen Wiig, Annette Bening, Matt Dillon, Natasha Lyonne.(n)

programme.title: Carve Her Name With Pride
programme.desc: The valiant World War II French resistance fighter Violette Szabo sacrifices everything for her cause.(n)

programme.title: Convoy
programme.desc: A tale of the highs and lows of life protecting the convoys between America and England during WWII.(n)

programme.title: The Captive Heart
programme.desc: An imprisoned Czech captain (who impersonated a dead Englishman) must convince British POWs that he is not an enemy spy.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) returns to Abigail's (Melora Hardin) life 12 years later as a lawyer to defend her against murder charges. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a young farmer who robs a bank in order to even a score with the bank's corrupt president (Jonathan Hogan); Sam (Scott Bakula) shares a tender moment with his father (Scott Bakula in a dual role).(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: A Tale of Two Sweeties - February 25, 1958
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a sleazy traveling salesman and discovers that he has more than just business contacts in Florida and New York -- he also has two wives. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a homemaker and mother involved in the feminist movement of the '60s, who must fight the chauvinistic beliefs of her husband (guest star Max Gail). With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of the celebrated sex therapist Dr. Ruth (guest star Dr. Ruth Westheimer) and finds himself dispensing advice on her radio talk show. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into what he believes to be a vampire, and must keep away from his new bride (Shae D'Lynn) to prevent himself from biting her. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Cross of Voodoo
programme.desc: When two graduate students on the trail of the Haitian Cross of Utu disappear in New Orleans, Sydney and Nigel go down on the bayou to find them.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are on a trip, so Claudia decides to help Sydney's friend Roger to find Julius Caesar's armor, but relic hunting is not her talent.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Reel Thing
programme.desc: Working as consultants for an archeology adventure film, Sydney and Nigel realize the Pharaoh Amun II's props are genuine, long-thought lost relics. How can they be?(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Claudia discovers that she was Cleopatra's servant in a past life when she experiences déjà vu while watching a catalog from an Ancient Egyptian relics exposition.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Eyes of Toklamanee
programme.desc: Sydney and her student Adam are onto his ancestors' fabled Eyes of Toklamanee, but they are pursued by mysterious gunmen.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)
